ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(ISPICKVAL(loan__Loan_Cycle_Setup__c, 'Same for all Loans'),(loan__Default_Overdue_Interest_Rate__c > loan__Max_Overdue_Interest_Rate__c || loan__Default_Overdue_Interest_Rate__c < loan__Min_Overdue_Interest_Rate__c))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The Default Overdue Interest Rate should fall between the specified Limits.
